analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0xa3ea91b1de57b59d51503ad03b2f7df1647eb3e7.sol:
	Contract EcoToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0xa3ea91b1de57b59d51503ad03b2f7df1647eb3e7.sol#242-243)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Expirable.isExpired (/unique_contracts/0xa3ea91b1de57b59d51503ad03b2f7df1647eb3e7.sol#6-12) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > expireAfter (/unique_contracts/0xa3ea91b1de57b59d51503ad03b2f7df1647eb3e7.sol#8-9)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0xa3ea91b1de57b59d51503ad03b2f7df1647eb3e7.sol#65-68) is not in mixedCase
